law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 16, effective July 1, 1954. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 2. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 2. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 1. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: School equalization fund administration and distribution, control of.
